abstract: A new feature set supporting all features in `.version1`.

## Discussion

To automatically get the latest features that PaperKit adds in new releases use `.latest`, to avoid new release adding unexpected functionality to your app use a specific version like `.version1`.

# version1

**Type Property**

A new feature set supporting all features in `.version1`.

## Declaration

```swift
static var version1: FeatureSet { get }
```

## Discussion

To automatically get the latest features that PaperKit adds in new releases use `.latest`, to avoid new release adding unexpected functionality to your app use a specific version like `.version1`.
title: version1
